sentence.Network_en: I'm adoringly staring the miracle maker in the face.
sentence.Network_cn: 我崇拜地看着这个奇迹的缔造者.

sentence.Network_en: He looked at his wife adoringly.
Otto was tucked into the crook of her elbow, listening adoringly as she read from the newspaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥托躺在妈妈弯着的胳臂肘里, 深情地听着我妈妈读报.

list.abs: maybe , to stop people from eating dogs , the best way is to think of your feelings when you adoringly into your dog's eyes ( or when he adoringly into yours ) !也许，要阻止人们杀害狗，最好的方法是想想当你注视你的狗的眼睛或者你的狗注视你时你的感受。

entry.tran: 热爱的；爱慕的；敬慕的；崇拜的
entry.def: An adoring person is someone who loves and admires another person very much.

example.ex: She can still pull in adoring audiences.
example.tran: 她仍然能吸引爱慕的观众。
